description:
Kindle remains the core pillar of my home business strategy. The beauty of publishing books on Kindle is that anyone can do it. Once you are published you have your product on the biggest online retailer...they know how to promote products. Amazon's Kindle Unlimited program can be very profitable for independent authors and publishers.

ONE PROBLEM: They have just CHANGED THE RULES!

Loads of independent authors have now ran a mile. However, if you learn how work with the new system and give readers what they want it can still make you a lot of money.

Just look at my Kindle income statements to see just how much!!!

By taking this course you will

  • Understand why Kindle Unlimited can be so profitable
  • How the new system works and how it pays
  • Why Amazon changed the rules.
  • Understand what content Amazon wants (....and readers)
  • How to optimise your book for maximum results
  • How to keep people reading...both Fiction and Non-Fiction

At the end of the course you will have the knowledge to understand how to benefit and profit from his program. By taking action your Kindle income could sky rocket in the next twelve months.
title: Writerâ€™s Complete Guide to Kindle Unlimited
